release_notes:
Version 1.0.18 - Auto-Upgrade Existing Trials
- CRITICAL FIX: Automatically extends existing trials to 5 days
- Old 3-day trials are auto-upgraded on app launch
- No manual reset needed for customers
- Trial extends from original start date (not reset)
- Example: 1 day left on 3-day trial â†’ becomes 3 days left on 5-day trial
- Hardware ID protection still active
